00017     protected XMLParser(final String feedUrl) {
00018             try {
00019                     this.feedUrl = new URL(feedUrl);
00020             } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
00021                     Log.e("Routing Error",e.getMessage());

00025     protected InputStream getInputStream() {
00026             try {
00027                     return feedUrl.openConnection().getInputStream();
00028             } catch (IOException e) {
00029                 Log.e("Routing Error",e.getMessage());
00030                     return null;
